snippet: The foreign minister, Mohammad Javad Zarif, has repeatedly sought to set the tone and context of continuing meetings with world powers on Iran’s nuclear energy pursuits through video and social media.
abstract: The foreign minister, Mohammad Javad Zarif, has repeatedly sought to set the tone and context of continuing meetings with world powers on Iran’s nuclear energy pursuits through video and social media.

headline.main: On YouTube, Iranian Minister Says 'Join Us' in Ending Crisis
